title: Why Google Pixel 4a camera portrait quality reduced?
content:
Hi..
I am using Google pixel 4a last 2 months, initial time  while using camera the portrait option was working fine and it's also showing comparison of taken pic... portrait and without portrait. And now it's not even showing comparison of clicked pics...and also the quality of clicked portrait pics was also not up to the quality when compare to initial time usage.
I am not understanding exactly.
Help on these issue.
